user_query: I want to know more about the environmental initiatives in African countries. Can you provide me with news articles on pollution and information about politicians who are actively involved in addressing this issue? Also, please fetch the details of a specific politician with Goverlytics ID '437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190'.

TaskList.description: Fetch news articles related to pollution in African countries.
Gather information about politicians in African countries who are actively involved in environmental initiatives.
Fetch details of the specific politician with Goverlytics ID '437c7e15-c66a-4b46-af9b-07e9b1317190'.
